Text:
This torrent might be these 3 ???

Battle Of The Giants! (27 Dec 71)
My Brother And I (26 Dec 75)
The Love Of Three Oranges (26 Dec 76)

Correct, it is the 3 Christmas Specials.

In the future I will add the episode list to my NFO, thanks!

Hi,

All good quality with just one little issue. Christmas Special 3 is the same is Christmas Special 1. Both are "The Battle of the Giants".

This means that "The Love Of Three Oranges" is missing!

Is is possible to re-encode the third one and upload a new torrent?

Thanks for the first two however! :-)
